name: Q PICK
description:
What is QPICK 

QPICK is a minimalist VR game aimed at being accessible and repayable, It was developed over 48 Hours for the VR Accessibility Game Jam. 

What you need to play 

All you need to play is your head, by nodding up and down you can move your pick to the goal pick. If the movement level isn't to your liking press space or pull one of your triggers to reset the level position.

Features 
  • Persistent High Score
  • High Performance Optimization
  • Minimalist Atmosphere
  • Intuitive Controls
  • Endless Replayability
